title: Pakistan’s ambassador designate to Switzerland calls on DPM Dar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 9 (APP): Pakistan’s Ambassador-designate to Switzerland, Dr. Marghoob Saleem Butt on Wednesday paid a farewell call on Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister, Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar.
During the meeting, the deputy PM encouraged him to proactively engage in enhancing bilateral ties and strengthening economic and commercial relations.
He emphasized the importance of working towards further deepening the existing friendly relations between the two countries.
